attributes.action: Stop the BBC receiving funds from the television licence
attributes.background: The BBC has and is continuing to demonstrate open partisan support for Brexit. Approximately 50% of the electorate do not support Brexit, hence the BBC is no longer impartial as a broadcaster. This petition requests that licence fees are no longer paid to the BBC.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235653

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797
